original_title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: Live in Japan
overview: „Live in Japan“ is a Red Hot Chili Peppers concert video released as unofficial DVD in 2007. The concert was recorded on their show in the International Stadium in Yokohama on July 25, 2004. It features 12 of the 18 songs played in the concert.
title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: Live in Japan
